event.desc: John Hopkins [the butler] paid Willelmum White by the appointment of [his] master in the amount of 15600 pence of the masking money.
John Hopkins paid Willelmum White further in the amount of 7200 pence of the masking money.
The tax of John Hopkins combined with that of Richard Daston was collected by Richard Daston in the total amount of 9600 pence
John Hopkins delivered to Richard Daston further masking money in the amount of 6000 pence
John Hopkins delivered to Willelmum White further masking money in the amount of 12000 pence
John Hopkins delivered to Willelmum White further masking money in the amount of 9600 pence
John Hopkins delivered to Willelmum White further masking money in the amount of 13200 pence
John Hopkins delivered to Willelmum White further masking money in the amount of 10800 pence

Richard Baldwin undertreasurer of Middle Temple paid John Dowlande [lutenist to the Kinges maiestie] William Cokine and Richard Goosey in the amount of 1200 pence for the concert performed before the judges and reverent benchers of the Middle Temple upon candellmas daye, 1612
Mr Baldwin undertreasurer of Middle Temple paid John Papson in the amount of 480 pence that was due at the feast of the purification

Sir Henrey Mountague Knight Recorder of the City of London paid Richard Baldwin Subtreasurer [of Middle Temple] in the amount of 16000 pence for the use of the fellowship of the house of the Middle Temple

Edward Powell loaned to the use of the fellowship of the house of Middle Temple for six months to be paid at the end of said six months 12000 pence which was received by Richard Baldwin subtreasurer [of Middle Temple]

Mr Richard Baldwin [undertreasurer of Middle Temple] paid Nicholas Herman by the appointment of his master Richard Martyn Esquier in the amount of 1600 pence for the use of the fellowship and society of the Middle Temple
Richard Baldwin undertreasurer of Middle Temple paid Christopher Brooke in the amount of 14400 pence towards the two maskes of the Middle Temple and Lincolns Inn
Themasters of the Bench at Middle Temple paid the tax for the mask to the John Hopkins in the amount of 10200 pence
Themasters of the utter bar at Middle Temple paid the tax for the mask to the John Hopkins in the amount of 15840 pence
Thegentlemen under the bar at Middle Temple paid the tax for the mask to John Hopkins in the amount of 5040 pence
The 25 masters of the Bench at Middle Temple paid the tax for the mask to the Johns Hopkins in the amount of 15000 pence
The 128 masters of the utter bar at Middle Temple paid the tax for the masque to the Johns Hopkins in the amount of 46080 pence
The 200 gentlemen under the bar at Middle Temple paid the tax for the mask to the Johns Hopkins in the amount of 36000 pence
Mr Daston was paid by John Hopkinsin the amount of 84000 pence
Mr Baldwyn, the undertreasurer of Middle Temple was paid by John Hopkinsin the amount of 7200 pence
John Hoplins was paid by John Hopkinsin the amount of 2427 pence
John Hopkins paid Richard Baldwin subtreasurar [of Middle Temple] in the amount of 24000 pence from the amounts collected from the last roll taxation for the late masque.
John Hopkins paid Richard Baldwin subtreasurar [of Middle Temple] in the amount of 24000 pence from the amounts collected from the roll for the late masque.
John Hopkins paid Richard Baldwin subtreasurar [of Middle Temple] in the amount of 240 pence from the amounts collected from the last roll taxation for the late masque.
John Hopkins paid Richard Baldwin subtreasurar [of Middle Temple] in the amount of 2400 pence for the late masque on an unknown day in August.
Richard Baldwin subtreasurer [of Middle Temple] paid Nicholas Herman who is the servant to Richard Martyn of Middle Temple London Esquier in the amount of 24000 pence for the late masque.
For four nights service of the musicians Mr Bawldwin was paid by John Papson in the amount of 480 pence
Richard Baldwin subtreasurer [of Middle Temple] paid Nicholas Herman who is the servant to Richard Martyn of Middle Temple London Esquier in the amount of 12000 pence for the late masque.
event.note: This document is from the point of view of the intermediery for the ultimate recepient not Middle Temple

event.desc: Richard Baldwin subtreasurer [of Middle Temple] paid Nicholas Herman who is the servant to Richard Martyn of Middle Temple London Esquier in the amount of 12000 pence for the late masque.

event.desc: Money towards the late Masque inprimis delivered by Mr Daston to the Middle Temple Accountant in the amount of 120720 pence

event.desc: Money was delivered by the undertreasurer [of Middle Temple] to Mr Herman [Mr Martyns man] in the amount of 1600 pence

event.desc: Money was delivered by the undertreasurer [of Middle Temple] to the said Mr Herman in the amount of 240 pence

event.desc: John Hopkins paid Richard Baldwin subtreasurer [of Middle Temple] in the amount of 2400 pence towards the late masque.
Nicholas Herman servant to Richard Martyn of the Middle Temple Esquier recieved from Richard Baldwin subtreasurer of Middle Temple3200 pence towards the late maske
Nicholas Herman servant to Richard Martyn of the Middle Temple Esquier recieved from Richard Baldwin [subtreasurer of Middle Temple]4800 pence towards the late maske
Sir Thomas Temple was paid 51600 pence by Middle Temple Accountant upon a bond due the same day
